name: Modulo 2
description:
Modulo 2 is a 2D isometric platformer with simple mechanics, tough gameplay, and an innovative goal: to pass all the fields an odd number of times; that is to say, the number of steps on each field must be congruent to 1 modulo 2 - hence the name Modulo 2.

If you could move in either of the 4 directions on each turn, the game would be simple. Adding the rule that you're not allowed to move directly to the previous square brought the game to an incredibly difficult level.

Made by Katarina & Domagoj from Croatia.
